author: Dennis Cone
comment: Some watch faces have so many things to look at that by the time my eyes focused, picked out what I needed, 5 seconds had passed and goodby display. This app saved the experience of having a smart watch. Nice job.

author: Dan Polzic
comment: This is the one app I couldn't do without. No more lights out after 5 seconds!

author: Brian Beezley
comment: Sometimes it works right.. Sometimes it dims too fast... Sometimes my watch just randomly lights up (didn't do that before this app)  For an app I spent money on, it sure would have been nice to have it work.  Maybe I'm doing something wrong?

reply.author: PhonePhreak Software
reply.content: I am sorry to hear that! Which watch model do you have? Please contact me at support@phonephreaksoftware.com so we can work this out!

comment: I recently purchased a Fossil Q Explorist. I loved everything about the watch except that the beautifully designed watchface would so quickly disappear. Then I did a Google search and found this app. It's everything and more that I wanted! I absolutely love the Indefinite and Indefinite+ options. I haven't thoroughly tested the watch for battery life with the app (it will obviously not be too great if always on), but it will serve exactly what I need. Well worth the money. Thank you for this brilliant app!

author: Konstantin Ioseliani
comment: moto 360 2gen installed at the phone, but did not show up on the watch even after 1 hour and two restart both of the devices.

reply.author: PhonePhreak Software
reply.content: Please try installing it directly from the watch. To do so, open the Play Store app on the watch and do a search for "StayLit Wear". Then install it directly from there.

author: Mike Barrett
comment: Brilliant must have App for all Android Wear watches. Works exactly as it should.

author: Franjo Dobrun
comment: Zenwatch 2 setting to 2min works and then doesnt...then works and again does not.Pls look into itFix pls.Great.Still 5stars

reply.author: PhonePhreak Software
reply.content: I am sorry to hear that StayLit doesn't work reliably! Did this come over time? Or didn't it work from the start? Please contact me at support@phonephreaksoftware.com

author: Roswitha Stein
comment: Very easy to use and works perfectly. Thank you!

author: MD Paul
comment: Does not load onto the watch. Nixon Mission.

reply.author: PhonePhreak Software
reply.content: Please try installing it directly from the watch. To do so, open the Play Store app on the watch and do a search for "StayLit Wear". Then install it directly from there.

author: Leon Copeland
comment: So inconsistent

author: Paco Bonilla
comment: Awesome it works great

author: Andrew Isle
comment: Does exactly what I wanted it to

author: M. H.
comment: Doesnt work properly on my Fossil Q Control. I have set it to 10sec timeout. Sometimes it works, then randomly, the watch turns off, after a few seconds (2-5), even if there was a touch event, as if the last touch wasnt correctly used to reset the timer.

reply.author: PhonePhreak Software
reply.content: What resets the timer is waking the watch from dimmed state (which unfortunately is all a Wear app can do). The light will then stay on as long as selected. However when still using the watch after this timeout, it may turn off after the default 5 secs. Most often though this isn't a problem as many Wear apps have permanent backlight enabled anyway

author: Bob Quinlan
comment: This is one of those simple apps that does one useful thing extremely well.  If you don't want your watch to timeout so quickly this is the best solution I have found.  Highly recommended!

author: Flash H
comment: Brilliant works perfectly and solved big problem, I can now make watch face youtube videos without having to constantly tap to keep my screen awake.. Thankyou

author: Andre Flowers
comment: I have had this app since Android Ware came out.  Works on all watches I've put the app on.

author: Leko Fraggle
comment: Oddly enough, eventually I could download it directly, and it seems to work well now.  Remember to search for the entire name.  StayLit Wear.

reply.author: PhonePhreak Software
reply.content: StayLit is available in the Play Store directly on the watch. Please contact me at support@phonephreaksoftware.com for further assistance or a refund

author: kylie john Skates
comment: Absolutely fantastic app. Simple app with a simple job and it does it perfectly. Thank you so much for this. I needed it on my Fossil Q Marshall.

author: Rick Marsh
comment: This fantastic app does everything it claims. Thank you for this, it's just what I was looking for 😎

author: Lance Barnes
comment: Excellent product for Moto 360 2nd gen

author: I N
comment: It does exactly what it needs to do. Keep the screen awake for the time that I set it to.

author: stephen defrancis
comment: Just what I needed to keep the desired watch face on the watch indefinitely. Thank you! !!!!

author: Howie Chaim Schneider
comment: Easy installation, great app. "Indefinitely+" setting is wonderful.

author: Laura West
comment: Doesn't seem to work for my Fossil Q Wander. 🙁

reply.author: PhonePhreak Software
reply.content: Sorry to hear that! However it should work on the Fossil Q Wander. Is there a problem installing the app? Please contact me at support@phonephreaksoftware.com

author: Bri Robertson
comment: Simple app that does the job perfectly.

author: Orpha Mortimer
comment: Works great. Exactly what I needed.

author: Andreas Simatos
comment: Simple and does what it says.

author: Felix Assous
comment: Works

author: Andre McPhail
comment: Awesome

author: Peter Maerz
comment: Wouldn't have thought it would be so difficult to find a simple solution to the very short default screen-on time on my Moto 360. This app, found through a Google search, does the job. Simply. Quickly. Efficiently. From 5 seconds to (almost) always-on, it takes just seconds to set up and works every time, without in any way impeding the function of my watch.    Let the world know!

author: Sreeji Nair
comment: doesnt work on my moto 360 1st gen and oneplus 3T. it doesnt even show up on the watch. I've tried resync apps as well as  reboot watch n phone, and since its a brand new phone which I got 2 days ago.. I didnt find it necessary to flash/root or factory restore the phone...

reply.author: PhonePhreak Software
reply.content: UPDATE: One more thing you can do is check if the Android Wear app on the phone is excempt from Doze Mode. Sorry that app installation in Android Wear has remained a sometimes complicated procedure for so long! Gladly, all of that will change with the upcoming Wear 2.0 update, which allows to install apps from the Play Store directly to the watch.

author: Len Mulaski
comment: Will not push to my Urbane. Add a force push or fix and I'll re-evaluate.  The fix suggested worked - it took a bit to locate the resync in android wear, but it came up immediately afterwards.. Thanks!

reply.author: PhonePhreak Software
reply.content: In case the app isn't pushed to the watch automatically, try the "resync apps" option in the Android Wear app on your phone: There, tap the Settings icon (top-right corner), then tap on the watch's name (right below "Device settings"). "Resync apps" is the last option in the menu. If this doesn't help, please try rebooting the watch and the phone.

title: No push - update

comment: I've always wanted a way to have watch face say on more than 5 sec. So I could see info better before timing out so soon. I looked on Google and saw this app. It's a paid app but from good reviews I'd though I'd give it a try. This app worked great no problems  At all. Was worth every penny.  Thanks to the person(s) who ever developed this app. (Phone freaks) It's appreciated.   Ps: works on Huawei watch.  If you have this watch, screen burn in shouldn't be a problem. The programing moves the screen face slightly pixel by pixel.  Thanks

author: Javier Gonzalez
comment: Exactly what I have been looking for. The dim times on android wear were silly. This app has saved the day by giving you the freedom to adjust to your needs.
title: Finally!

author: Lorraine Mills
comment: Did exactly what I needed it to do on my Moto 360 Sport.  Was getting fed up of the screen disappearing before I'd had to chance to check stats etc.... This seems to do the job. Shame the watch can't do it by itself..... Well done developer.

author: James stewart
comment: Absolutely wonderful what I've been looking for since I got the watch. It would turn off every 4 seconds. I couldn't show anyone my watch face no one would ever see it it was embarrassing I knew there was a problem they should have put this in the design of the watch in the first place

author: Martin Lynch
comment: Does exactly what I need it to: keeps my Nixon Mission watch face from disappearing into terrible black and white after 3 seconds (important since the Mission is very poor at waking on arm motion). Unfortunately battery life is substantially impacted (watch's fault, not app).

author: Jimmy Jennings
comment: It really should be a default setting to set the timeout on a smart watch. It seems kind of silly to pay for something like this, but.. It does the job fantastically. Very happy.
title: Awesome.

author: Sara Hakes
comment: Causes Nixon mission watch to crash. would like a refund

reply.author: PhonePhreak Software
reply.content: I am sorry to hear this! It appears that also other apps which work flawlessly on any other Wear watch are causing crashes just on the Nixon (on Reddit, Nixon users are reporting crashes caused by well-established apps like Watchmaker Premium and Facer). For a refund, please contact me at support@phonephreaksoftware.com...

author: Andy Dufek
comment: Found this when the other similar app I was using on my old AW watch had become abandonware (despite my having paid for the Premium version).  Happy to see the great reviews of this one and *love* the indefinitely+ setting!!!  Happy to pay for such a useful piece of software!  Thank you!
